III. DESCRIPTION OF FINDINGS & CONCLUSIONS
A. Physical Description of Facility This is six bed coed facility beautifully decorated
and re-modeled. It is a residential house in the city of Flint. It was previously licensed
however it has been closed for several years. Whaley the parent organization has
completely remodeled the house. Each bedroom is beautifully decorated with its own
theme.
B. Program Description The program will service residents 6-17. It is an open
program where children receive more privileges with improved behaviors. The children
attend the local public school and the agency works with families to help ensure
success when children return to birth families or a placed in permanent homes.
